Name: Wild Growth Rush
Story Background: In the heart of the enchanted forest, the wild growth surges with untamed power, ready to unleash its fury at a moment's notice.
Ability: Target creature gains +2/+2 and trample until end of turn. Then, if you control a Forest, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Appearance Description: The card art shows a lush forest teeming with vibrant foliage and magical energy, with tendrils of green light wrapping around a creature, empowering it in a wild rush of growth and power.
